long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PathProbe is a powerful Chrome Developer Tools extension designed for web security testing / ethical hacking.
This tool asynchronously scans user-defined paths of specified target, enabling rapid and efficient discovery of sensitive data. Key features include subdomain enumeration for automated multi-domain testing using censys api.
Additional functionalities like advanced filtering and search options make result management effortless. Ideal for ethical hackers, security specialists, and developers seeking to improve website security.

Initially developed as a personal project, PathProbe is now available for public use.

Consider supporting the project in the project settings.
